title: Seers' Council

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Seers' Council run Seers' Village, dealing with issues like crime and relocation. A named member of the council is Phantuwti Fanstuwi Farsight, the leader of the Seers, yet the rest are only shown on the interface as Seers.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Seers' Council
Seers' Council
Released 24 July 2007 (Update)
Current leader Phantuwti Fanstuwi Farsight
Locations Seers' Village

The Seers' Council run Seers' Village, dealing with issues like crime and relocation. A named member of the council is Phantuwti Fanstuwi Farsight, the leader of the Seers, yet the rest are only shown on the interface as Seers.

Seers' Council is mentioned in the quest, King's Ransom.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Seers' Council is quite similar to a city council, commonly used in cities in real life.

The '''Seers' Council''' run [[Seers' Village]], dealing with issues like crime and relocation. A named member of the council is [[Phantuwti Fanstuwi Farsight]], the leader of the Seers, yet the rest are only shown on the interface as [[Seer]]s.

Seers' Council is mentioned in the quest, [[King's Ransom]].

==Trivia==
*Seers' Council is quite similar to a [[Wikipedia:City council|city council]], commonly used in cities in real life.
